content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Mine at position(unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position unknown) and a furnace at position(unknown)

### Copper Plate Factory at position(unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position(0.0, 0.0)) with inventory {'iron-plate': 9} and status NO_INGREDIENTS
- Furnace (position(2.0, 0.0)) with inventory {'copper-ore': 2} and status WORKING, producing {'copper-plate': 90}

### Iron Plate Factory at position(unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position(0.0, 0.0)) with inventory {'iron-plate': 9} and status NO_INGREDIENTS
- Furnace (position(2.0, 0.0)) with inventory {'copper-ore': 2} and status WORKING, producing {'copper-plate': 90}

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available in the inventory or being processed in a furnace before attempting to craft items. For example, copper-cable requires copper-plate, which must be produced in a furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
